text: A Cowboy Afraid of Horses is the fifth album by Lobo and his final album on Big Tree Records, released in 1975. The album, along with Just a Singer, was reissued in 1997 by Rhino Records as a single issue under the said title. The album peaked at No. 151 on the US Top LPs chart, becoming his final album to chart to date.
